verses.verse: And <WG2532> again<WG3825> he began<WG756> to teach<WG1321> by<WG3844> the sea side<WG2281>. And<WG2532> there is gathered<WG4863> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> a<WG3793> very great<WG4183> multitude<WG3793>, so that<WG5620> he<WG846> entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> a boat<WG4143>, and<WG2532> sat<WG2521> in<WG1722> the<WG3793> sea<WG2281>; and<WG2532> all the<WG3793> multitude<WG3793> were by<WG4314> the sea<WG2281> on<WG1909> the land<WG1093>.
And <WG2532> he taught<WG1321> them<WG846> many things<WG4183> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>, and<WG2532> said<WG3004> unto them<WG846> in<WG1722> his<WG846> teaching<WG1322>,
Hearken <WG191>: Behold<WG2400>, the sower<WG4687> went forth<WG1831> to sow<WG4687>:

and <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, as<WG1722> he sowed<WG4687>, some<WG3303> seed fell<WG4098> by<WG3844> the way side<WG3598>, and<WG2532> the birds4071, 3772 came<WG2064> and<WG2532> devoured<WG2719> it<WG846>.

And <WG1161> other<WG243> fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> the rocky ground<WG4075>, where<WG3699> it had<WG2192> not<WG3756> much<WG4183> earth<WG1093>; and<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> it sprang up<WG1816>, because<WG1223> it had<WG2192> no<WG3361> deepness<WG899> of earth<WG1093>:
and <WG1161> when<WG393> the sun<WG2246> was risen<WG393>, it was scorched<WG2739>; and<WG2532> because<WG1223> it had<WG2192> no<WG3361> root<WG4491>, it withered away<WG3583>.

And <WG2532> other<WG243> fell<WG4098> among<WG1519> the thorns<WG173>, and<WG2532> the thorns<WG173> grew up<WG305>, and<WG2532> choked<WG4846> it<WG846>, and<WG2532> it yielded<WG1325> no<WG3756> fruit<WG2590>.

And <WG2532> others<WG243> fell<WG4098> into the good<WG2570> ground<WG1093>, and<WG2532> yielded<WG1325> fruit<WG2590>, growing up<WG305> and<WG2532> increasing<WG837>; and<WG2532> brought forth<WG5342>, thirtyfold<WG5144>, and<WG2532> sixtyfold<WG1835>, and<WG2532> a<WG1520> hundredfold<WG1540>.
And <WG2532> he said<WG3004>, <WG846> Who hath<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear<WG191>, let him hear<WG191>.
And <WG1161> when<WG3753> he was<WG1096> alone<WG2651>, they that were about<WG4012> him<WG846> with<WG4862> the twelve<WG1427> asked<WG2065> of him<WG846> the parables<WG3850>.

And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Unto you<WG5213> is given<WG1325> the<WG1097> mystery<WG3466> of the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>: but<WG1161> unto them<WG1565> that are without<WG1854>, all<WG3956> things<WG3956> are done<WG1096> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>:

that <WG2443> seeing<WG991> they may see<WG991>, and<WG2532> not<WG3361> perceive<WG1492>; and<WG2532> hearing<WG191> they may hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> not<WG3361> understand<WG4920>; lest haply<WG3379> they should turn<WG1994> again<WG2532>, and it<WG265> should be forgiven<WG863> them<WG846>.
And <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Know ye<WG1492> not<WG3756> this<WG3778> parable<WG3850>? and<WG2532> how shall<WG4459> ye know<WG1097> all<WG3956> the parables<WG3850>?
The sower<WG4687> soweth<WG4687> the word<WG3056>.

And <WG1161> these<WG3778> are they<WG1526> by<WG3844> the way side<WG3598>, where<WG3699> the word<WG3056> is sown<WG4687>; and<WG2532> when<WG3752> they have heard<WG191>, straightway<WG2112> cometh<WG2064> Satan<WG4567>, and<WG2532> taketh away<WG142> the word<WG3056> which hath been sown<WG4687> in1722, 846 them<WG2588>.

And <WG2532> these<WG3778> in like manner<WG3668> are they<WG1526> that are sown<WG4687> upon<WG1909> the rocky places<WG4075>, who<WG3739>, when<WG3752> they have heard<WG191> the word<WG3056>, straightway<WG2112> receive<WG2983> it<WG846> with<WG3326> joy<WG5479>;

and <WG2532> they have<WG2192> no<WG3756> root<WG4491> in<WG1722> themselves<WG1438>, but<WG235> endure<WG1526> for a while<WG4340>; then<WG1534>, when<WG4340> tribulation<WG2347> or<WG2228> persecution<WG1375> ariseth<WG1096> because<WG1223> of the word<WG3056>, straightway<WG2112> they stumble<WG4624>.
And <WG2532> others<WG3778> are they<WG1526> that are sown<WG4687> among<WG1519> the thorns<WG173>; these are they that have heard<WG191> the word<WG3056>,

and <WG2532> the cares<WG3308> of the<WG5127> world<WG165>, and<WG2532> the deceitfulness<WG539> of riches<WG4149>, and<WG2532> the lusts<WG1939> of<WG4012> other things<WG3062> entering in<WG1531>, choke<WG4846> the word<WG3056>, and<WG2532> it becometh<WG1096> unfruitful<WG175>.

And <WG2532> those<WG3778> are<WG1526> they that were sown<WG4687> upon<WG1909> the good<WG2570> ground<WG1093>; such as<WG3748> hear<WG191> the word<WG3056>, and<WG2532> accept<WG3858> it<WG2532>, and bear fruit<WG2592>, <WG1520> thirtyfold<WG5144>, and2532, 1520 sixtyfold<WG1835>, and<WG2532> a<WG1520> hundredfold<WG1540>.

And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Is<WG3385> the lamp<WG3088> brought<WG2064> to<WG2443> be put<WG5087> under<WG5259> the bushel<WG3426>, or<WG2228> under<WG5259> the bed<WG2825>, and not<WG3756> to<WG2443> be put on the stand<WG1909>?

For <WG1063> there is<WG2076> nothing<WG5100> hid<WG2927>, save<WG3361> that<WG3739> it should<WG1437> be manifested<WG5319>; neither<WG3761> was anything made<WG1096> secret<WG614>, but<WG235> that<WG1519> it should come<WG2064> to light<WG5318>.
If <WG1487> any man<WG5100> hath<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear<WG191>, let him hear<WG191>.

And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Take heed<WG991> what<WG5101> ye hear<WG191>: with<WG1722> what<WG3739> measure<WG3358> ye mete<WG3354> it shall be measured<WG3354> unto you<WG5213>; and<WG2532> more shall be given<WG4369> unto you<WG5213>.

For <WG1063> he that<WG302> hath<WG2192>, to him<WG846> shall be given<WG1325>: and<WG2532> he that<WG3739> hath<WG2192> not<WG3756>, from<WG575> him<WG846> shall be taken<WG142> away even<WG2532> that which<WG3739> he hath<WG3739>.
And <WG2532> he said<WG3004>, So<WG3779> is<WG2076> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>, as<WG5613> if<WG1437> a man<WG444> should cast<WG906> seed<WG4703> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>;

and <WG2532> should sleep<WG2518> and<WG2532> rise<WG1453> night<WG3571> and<WG2532> day<WG2250>, and<WG2532> the seed<WG4703> should spring<WG985> up<WG3373> and<WG2532> grow<WG846>, he knoweth<WG1492> not<WG3756> how<WG5613>.

The earth<WG1093> beareth fruit<WG2592> of herself<WG844>; first<WG4412> the blade<WG5528>, then<WG1534> the<WG4621> ear<WG4719>, then<WG1534> the<WG4621> full<WG4134> grain<WG4621> in<WG1722> the ear<WG4719>.
But <WG1161> when<WG3752> the fruit<WG2590> is ripe<WG3860>, straightway<WG2112> he putteth forth<WG3860> the sickle<WG1407>, because<WG3754> the harvest<WG2326> is come<WG3936>.
And <WG2532> he said<WG3004>, How<WG5101> shall we liken<WG3666> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>? or<WG2228> in what<WG4169> parable<WG3850> shall we set<WG3846> it forth<WG846>?

It is like<WG5613> a grain<WG2848> of mustard seed<WG4615>, which<WG3739>, when<WG3752> it is sown<WG4687> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>, though it be<WG2076> less than<WG3398> all<WG3956> the seeds<WG4690> that are<WG3588> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>,

yet <WG2532> when<WG3752> it is sown<WG4687>, groweth up<WG305>, and<WG2532> becometh<WG1096> greater than<WG3187> all<WG3956> the herbs<WG3001>, and<WG2532> putteth out<WG4160> great<WG3173> branches<WG2798>; so that<WG5620> the birds<WG4071> of the heaven<WG3772> can<WG1410> lodge<WG2681> under<WG5259> the shadow<WG4639> thereof<WG846>.
And <WG2532> with<WG5108> many<WG4183> such<WG5108> parables<WG3850> spake he<WG2980> the word<WG3056> unto them<WG846>, as<WG2531> they were able<WG1410> to hear it<WG191>;

and <WG1161> without<WG5565> a parable<WG3850> spake he<WG2980> not<WG3756> unto them<WG846>: but<WG1161> privately<WG2398> to<WG3101> his<WG846> own disciples<WG3101> he expounded<WG1956> all things<WG3956>.
And <WG2532> on<WG1722> that<WG2250> day<WG2250>, when<WG1096> even<WG3798> was come<WG1096>, he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Let us go over<WG1330> unto<WG1519> the other side<WG4008>.

And <WG2532> leaving<WG863> the multitude<WG3793>, they take<WG3880> him<WG846> with them<WG5613>, even as he was<WG2258>, in<WG1722> the boat<WG4143>. And<WG2532> other<WG243> boats<WG4142> were<WG2258> with<WG3326> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> there ariseth<WG1096> a<WG2978> great<WG3173> storm<WG2978> of wind<WG417>, and<WG1161> the waves<WG2949> beat<WG1911> into<WG1519> the boat<WG4143>, insomuch that<WG5620> the<WG846> boat<WG4143> was<WG1072> now filling<WG2235>.

And <WG2532> he<WG846> himself was<WG2258> in<WG1909> the stern<WG4403>, asleep<WG2518> on<WG1909> the cushion<WG4344>: and<WG2532> they awake<WG1326> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Teacher<WG1320>, carest<WG3199> thou<WG4671> not<WG3756> that<WG3754> we perish<WG622>?

And <WG2532> he awoke<WG1326>, and<WG2532> rebuked<WG2008> the wind<WG417>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto the sea<WG2281>, Peace<WG4623>, be still<WG5392>. And<WG2532> the wind<WG417> ceased<WG2869>, and<WG2532> there was<WG1096> a<WG1055> great<WG3173> calm<WG1055>.
And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> are ye<WG2075> fearful<WG1169>? have<WG2192> ye<WG4459> not<WG3756> yet faith<WG4102>?

And <WG2532> they feared<WG5399> exceedingly<WG3173>, and<WG2532> said<WG3004> one<WG240> to<WG4314> another<WG240>, Who<WG5101> then<WG687> is<WG2076> this<WG3778>, that<WG3754> even<WG2532> the wind<WG417> and<WG2532> the sea<WG2281> obey<WG5219> him<WG846>?
